Question & Options:
In the movie 'Kaal' (2005), which of the following statements are true regarding the relationship between Shah and Karan Johar?
Options:
A. A) Shah was a lead actor in 'Kaal'.
B. B) Shah had previously assisted Karan Johar.
C. C) Karan Johar directed 'Kabhi Khushi Kabhie Gham'.
D. D) Shah and Karan Johar collaborated on multiple projects.
Correct Answer: B) Shah had previously assisted Karan Johar., C) Karan Johar directed 'Kabhi Khushi Kabhie Gham'.
